EmailTemplate.description: Template if an application is submitted for renewal for certification as an In-Home Aide
EmailTemplate.name: IHA Application Renewal Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Renew Application for In-Home Aide for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It is time to renew your certificate as an In-Home Aide. To complete your application for renewal log on to the OCLQS system at https://oclqs.force.com/oclqs_home
Please contact your County Agency with additional questions about renewal of your certification.
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
